 <body>
  <style type="text/css">
   @charset "UTF-8";
.menu-icon {
  background: url(/static/img/sprites/hotlink-ok/menu-icons.png) top left no-repeat; }

span.menu-icon {
  display: inline-block; }

@media only screen and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2), only screen and (min-device-pixel-ratio: 2) {
  .menu-icon {
    background-image: url(/static/img/sprites/hotlink-ok/menu-icons2x.png);
    background-size: 320px 320px; } }
.menu-icon.ai-customer-scheduling-32 {
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;
  background-position: -128px -192px; }

.menu-icon.android-app-32 {
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;
  background-position: -288px -64px; }

.menu-icon.api-32 {
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;
  background-position: -288px -32px; }

.menu-icon.automated-route-simulations-32 {
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;
  background-position: -288px -0px; }

.menu-icon.autonomous-vehicle-dispatch-32 {
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;

html.noscroll {
  position: fixed;
  width: 100%;
  overflow-y: scroll;
  pointer-events: none;
  user-select: none; }

#global-menu {
  font-family: 'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 1.428571;
  user-select: none;
  pointer-events: auto;
  cursor: default;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  padding-bottom: 70px;
  background-color: #4f6290;
  background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right top, from(#4f6290), to(#3f5e76));
  background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, #4f6290, #3f5e76);
  background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(left, #4f6290, #3f5e76);
  background-image: -ms-linear-gradient(left, #4f6290, #3f5e76);
  background-image: -o-linear-gradient(left, #4f6290, #3f5e76);
  background-image: linear-gradient(left, #4f6290, #3f5e76);
  filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorStr='#4f6290', endColorStr='#3f5e76', gradientType='1');
  /* micro scroll */ }
  #global-menu .phone-container {
    height: 90px;
    background: url(/static/global-menu/hotlink-ok/header-bg-8bit.png) no-repeat; }
    @media only screen and (max-width: 650px) {
      #global-menu .phone-container .free-trial-button {
        display: none; } }
    #global-menu .phone-container .phone {
      text-decoration: none;
      color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); }
  #global-menu .horizontal-container {
    z-index: 10;
    background: #545f98;
    background-color: #3f4d73;
    background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right top, from(#3f4d73), to(#334d57));
    background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(left, #3f4d73, #334d57);
    background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(left, #3f4d73, #334d57);
    background-image: -ms-linear-gradient(left, #3f4d73, #334d57);
    background-image: -o-linear-gradient(left, #3f4d73, #334d57);
    background-image: linear-gradient(left, #3f4d73, #334d57);
    filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorStr='#3f4d73', endColorStr='#334d57', gradientType='1');
    position: fixed;
    width: 100%;
    line-height: 70px;
    box-shadow: 0 0 13px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25); }
    #global-menu .horizontal-container .wrapper {
      padding: 0 15px;
      height: 70px;
      background: url(/static/global-menu/hotlink-ok/header-bg-8bit.png) no-repeat 0 -90px; }
      #global-menu .horizontal-container .wrapper > * {
        display: block; }
      #global-menu .horizontal-container .wrapper .left-side {
        overflow-y: hidden;
        height: 70px;
        float: left; }
        #global-menu .horizontal-container .wrapper .left-side .menu-button {
          float: left;
          cursor: pointer;
          padding: 0 20px; }
          #global-menu .horizontal-container .wrapper .left-side .menu-button .label {
            font-size: 13px; }
          @media only screen and (max-width: 420px) {
            #global-menu .horizontal-container .wrapper .left-side .menu-button {
              padding: 0 5px; } }
          @media only screen and (max-width: 380px) {
            #global-menu .horizontal-container .wrapper .left-side .menu-button .label {
              display: none; } }
          #global-menu .horizontal-container .wrapper .left-side .menu-button .glyphicon {
            font-size: 17px;
            line-height: 70px;
            vertical-align: -4%;
            top: 0; }
          #global-menu .horizontal-container .wrapper .left-side .menu-button.active {
            background-color: #313D57; }
        #global-menu .horizontal-container .wrapper .left-side a.logo img {
          padding: 9px 20px;
          width: auto;
          /* you can use % */
          height: 70px; }
      #global-menu .horizontal-container .wrapper .horizontal-menu {
        float: right; }
      #global-menu .horizontal-container .wrapper .right-side {
        float: right; }
        @media only screen and (max-width: 650px) {
          #global-menu .horizontal-container .wrapper .right-side {
            display: none; } }
  #global-menu .vertical-menu {
    z-index: 5;
    position: fixed;
    width: 100%;
    bottom: 0; }
  #global-menu .horizontal-menu, #global-menu .right-side {
    font-size: 17px; }
    #global-menu .horizontal-menu a, #global-menu .horizontal-menu a:hover, #global-menu .horizontal-menu a:visited, #global-menu .horizontal-menu a:focus, #global-menu .right-side a, #global-menu .right-side a:hover, #global-menu .right-side a:visited, #global-menu .right-side a:focus {
      color: inherit;
      text-decoration: none; }
    #global-menu .horizontal-menu > ul, #global-menu .right-side > ul {
      display: block;
      padding: 0;
      margin: 0; }
      #global-menu .horizontal-menu > ul > li, #global-menu .right-side > ul > li {
        display: block;
        float: left;
        position: relative; }
        #global-menu .horizontal-menu > ul > li > a, #global-menu .right-side > ul > li > a {
          display: inline-block;
          line-height: 70px;
          padding: 0 12px;
          white-space: nowrap; }
          #global-menu .horizontal-menu > ul > li > a.has-submenu:after, #global-menu .right-side > ul > li > a.has-submenu:after {
            content: "";
            width: 0;
            height: 0;
            border-style: solid;
            border-width: 6px 6px 1px 6px;
            border-color: #d6d6d6 transparent transparent transparent;
            display: inline-block;
            margin: 0 5px; }
          #global-menu .horizontal-menu > ul > li > a .menu-icon, #global-menu .right-side > ul > li > a .menu-icon {
            display: inline-block;
            vertical-align: middle; }
  #global-menu .horizontal-container ul > li > ul {
    position: absolute;
    background-color: #313D57;
    line-height: 32px;
    display: block;
    visibility: hidden;
    opacity: 0;
    transition: opacity .15s ease-in;
    list-style: none;
    padding: 10px 0 20px;
    margin: 0; }
    #global-menu .horizontal-container ul > li > ul > li a {
      display: inline-block;
      width: 100%;
      min-width: 250px;
      padding: 3px 20px;
      white-space: nowrap; }
      #global-menu .horizontal-container ul > li > ul > li a .menu-icon {
        display: inline-block;
        vertical-align: middle; }
      #global-menu .horizontal-container ul > li > ul > li a:hover {
        background-color: #3A4966; }
      #global-menu .horizontal-container ul > li > ul > li a.has-icon {
        padding: 10px 20px; }
  #global-menu .horizontal-container ul > li:hover > a {
    background-color: #313D57; }
  #global-menu .horizontal-container ul > li:hover > ul {
    visibility: visible;
    opacity: 1; }
  #global-menu [data-level] {
    background: #313D57; }
    #global-menu [data-level] a, #global-menu [data-level] a:hover, #global-menu [data-level] a:visited, #global-menu [data-level] a:focus {
      color: inherit;
      text-decoration: none; }

      background: #313D57; }
    #global-menu [data-level][data-level="2"] {
      background: #35435E; }
    #global-menu [data-level][data-level="3"] {
      background: #3A4966; }
  #global-menu [data-submenu-id] {
    padding: 25px 0 50px;
    font-size: 16px; }
    #global-menu [data-submenu-id] h1 {
      padding: 8px 18px;
      margin: 0 0 30px;
      font-size: 20px;
      line-height: 20px; }

        font-size: 13px; }

          #global-menu [data-submenu-id] > a.small.with-divider:last-child {
            border-bottom: none; }
      #global-menu [data-submenu-id] > a > span {
        display: block;
        font-size: 11px;
        color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5); }
      #global-menu [data-submenu-id] > a:hover {
        color: white; }
        #global-menu [data-submenu-id] > a:hover > span {
          color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); }
    #global-menu [data-submenu-id] hr {
      margin: 5px 18px;
      border: none;
      border-top: solid 1px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15); }
    #global-menu [data-submenu-id] [data-target-id] {
      position: relative;
      cursor: default;
      padding: 8px 33px 8px 18px;
      margin-bottom: 1px; }
      #global-menu [data-submenu-id] [data-target-id].active, #global-menu [data-submenu-id] [data-target-id]:hover, #global-menu [data-submenu-id] [data-target-id].active > a {
        color: #F8B255; }

      content: '❭';
      font-size: 18px;
      line-height: 18px;

    position: relative;

    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;

      opacity: 1; }
    #global-menu [data-level].visible {
      visibility: visible; }

    width: 0; }

    #global-menu.mobile [data-level][data-level="2"], #global-menu.mobile [data-level][data-level="3"] {
      left: 65px; }
  #global-menu div.microScroll::-webkit-scrollbar,
  #global-menu [data-level]::-webkit-scrollbar {
    width: 6px;
    height: 6px; }
  #global-menu div.microScroll::-webkit-scrollbar-track,
  #global-menu [data-level]::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
    background: transparent; }
  #global-menu div.microScroll::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb,
  #global-menu [data-level]::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.15);
    position: relative;
    -webkit-transition: background 0.2s;
    border-radius: 3px; }
  #global-menu div.microScroll::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover,
  #global-menu [data-level]::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
    background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25);
    position: relative;
    -webkit-transition: background 0.2s; }
  #global-menu .phone-container {
    padding: 20px; }
    #global-menu .phone-container > div {
      float: right;
      padding-left: 40px;
      text-align: right; }
    #global-menu .phone-container .phone {
      font-size: 30px;
      line-height: 28px;
      text-decoration: none !important; }
    #global-menu .phone-container .green-button {
      background: #a1c060;
      border-radius: 4px;
      font-weight: bold;
      font-size: 17px;
      color: #336601;
      text-shadow: 0 1px 0 rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.36);
      display: inline-block;
      padding: 12px 15px;
      transition: background .4s; }
      #global-menu .phone-container .green-button:hover {
        background: #b6d569; }
    #global-menu .phone-container a[href^="tel"] {
      text-decoration: none;
      color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); }

/*# sourceMappingURL=r4m-menu.css.map */
  </style>
  <div id="global-menu">

  <script type="text/javascript">
   (function($){$.fn.invisible=function(){return $(this).css({visibility:"hidden",position:"absolute",left:"-7000px"})};$.fn.visible=function(){return $(this).css({visibility:"visible",position:"relative"})};$.fn.clearInlineCss=function(){return $(this).removeAttr("style")};$.fn.disableScroll=function(){window.oldScrollPos=$(window).scrollTop();$(window).on("scroll.scrolldisabler",function(event){$(window).scrollTop(window.oldScrollPos);event.preventDefault()})};$.fn.enableScroll=function(){$(window).off("scroll.scrolldisabler")}})(jQuery);(function(){var mobileMode;var minWindowWidth=900;initHorizontalMenu();onWindowResize();$(window).resize(onWindowResize);$(window).scroll(onScroll);setTimeout(onWindowResize,50);setTimeout(onWindowResize,100);setTimeout(onWindowResize,200);setInterval(onWindowResize,1e3);function onWindowResize(){var width=$(window).width();setMenuMode(width<minWindowWidth);$("#global-menu").toggleClass("mobile",mobileMode).toggleClass("desktop",!mobileMode);fitHorizontalMenu();onScroll()}function onScroll(){var scroll=$(window).scrollTop();var phoneBar=$(".phone-container");var menuBar=$(".horizontal-container");var verticalMenu=$(".vertical-menu");var menuTop=Math.max(0,phoneBar.outerHeight()-scroll);menuBar.css("top",menuTop);verticalMenu.css("top",menuTop+menuBar.outerHeight())}function setMenuMode(isMobile){if(mobileMode!=isMobile){mobileMode=isMobile;if(isMobile){enableMobileMode()}else{enableDesktopMode()}}}function disableScroll(){}function enableScroll(){}function initHorizontalMenu(){}var currentTarget;function horizontalMenuItemOver(e){$(this).find("ul").show(100);console.log("enter");console.log(e.target);console.log(this)}function horizontalMenuItemOut(e){console.log("leave");console.log(e.target);console.log(this);$(this).find("ul").hide(100)}function fitHorizontalMenu(){var availableSpace=$(".horizontal-container>.wrapper").width()-$(".horizontal-container .left-side").outerWidth()-$(".horizontal-container .right-side").outerWidth();var horizontalMenuItems=$(".horizontal-menu>ul>li");var ww=[];horizontalMenuItems.each(function(){ww.push($(this).children("a").outerWidth())});var moreWidth=ww.pop();var sum=0;var i=ww.length;while(i--)sum+=ww[i];if(ww[0]+moreWidth>availableSpace){$(".horizontal-menu").invisible()}else{if(sum+20<availableSpace){horizontalMenuItems.slice(0,-1).clearInlineCss();horizontalMenuItems.last().invisible()}else{var s=0,count=0;availableSpace-=moreWidth+20;for(i=0;i<ww.length;i++){s+=ww[i];if(availableSpace>s){count++}else{break}}horizontalMenuItems.slice(0,count).clearInlineCss();horizontalMenuItems.slice(count,-1).invisible();horizontalMenuItems.last().clearInlineCss();horizontalMenuItems.last().find("li").show().slice(0,count).hide()}$(".horizontal-menu").clearInlineCss()}}var timerId;var levelsShouldBeVisible=0;var mouseOutDelay=300;var hideAnimationDelay=300;function enableDesktopMode(){disableMobileMode();$("[data-target-id]").hover(menuItemMouseEnter,menuItemMouseLeave);$("[data-level]").hover(panMouseEnter,panMouseLeave)}function disableDesktopMode(){$("[data-target-id]").off("mouseenter mouseleave");$("[data-level]").off("mouseenter mouseleave")}function menuItemMouseEnter(e){openSubmenu($(this).attr("data-target-id"))}function menuItemMouseLeave(e){setDesiredPanelsCount(levelsShouldBeVisible-1)}function panMouseEnter(){var lvl=parseInt($(this).attr("data-level"));if($(this).find("[data-target-id]:hover").length>0){lvl++}setDesiredPanelsCount(lvl)}function panMouseLeave(e){setDesiredPanelsCount(0)}function openSubmenu(submenuID){var submenu=$('[data-submenu-id="'+submenuID+'"]');var button=$('[data-target-id="'+submenuID+'"]');var pan=submenu.closest("[data-level]");var lvl=parseInt(pan.attr("data-level"));pan.addClass("active visible");button.addClass("active").siblings().removeClass("active");submenu.show().siblings().hide();setDesiredPanelsCount(lvl)}function setDesiredPanelsCount(n){clearTimeout(timerId);levelsShouldBeVisible=n;var levelsVisibleNow=getActivePanelsCount();if(n>0){disableScroll()}else{enableScroll()}if(levelsShouldBeVisible<levelsVisibleNow){timerId=setTimeout(function(){closeDesktopPanel(levelsVisibleNow);setDesiredPanelsCount(n)},mouseOutDelay)}}function getActivePanelsCount(){return $("[data-level].active").length}function closeDesktopPanel(lvl){var pan=$('[data-level="'+lvl+'"]');var submenuId=pan.find("[data-submenu-id]:visible").attr("data-submenu-id");var btn=$("#global-menu").find('[data-target-id="'+submenuId+'"]');btn.removeClass("active");pan.removeClass("active");$('[data-level="'+(lvl-1)+'"] [data-target-id].active').removeClass("active");setTimeout(function(){pan.removeClass("visible")},hideAnimationDelay)}function enableMobileMode(){disableDesktopMode();$(document).on("mousedown",null,onMouseDown);$("[data-target-id]").click(menuItemClick);$("[data-level]").click(panClick)}function disableMobileMode(){$(document).off("mousedown",null,onMouseDown);$("[data-target-id]").off("click");$("[data-level]").off("click")}function onMouseDown(e){if($("[data-level].visible").length&&!$(e.target).closest("[data-level]").length){closeMenu()}}function closeMenu(){$("[data-target-id]").removeClass("active");$("[data-level]").removeClass("active visible");$("[data-submenu-id]").hide();enableScroll()}function menuItemClick(e){var submenuID=$(this).attr("data-target-id");var submenu=$("#global-menu").find('[data-submenu-id="'+submenuID+'"]');var pan=submenu.closest("[data-level]").addClass("active visible");pan.nextAll().each(function(){closeMobilePan(this)});$(this).addClass("active").siblings().removeClass("active");submenu.show().siblings().hide();disableScroll();e.preventDefault()}function panClick(e){var pan=$(this);if(getActivePanelsCount()>parseInt(pan.attr("data-level"))){if(pan.find("[data-target-id]:hover").length<1){pan.nextAll().each(function(){closeMobilePan(this)})}}}function closeMobilePan(el){var pan=$(el);var submenuId=pan.find("[data-submenu-id]:visible").attr("data-submenu-id");var btn=$("#global-menu").find('[data-target-id="'+submenuId+'"]');btn.removeClass("active");pan.removeClass("active visible")}})();
  </script>
  <style>
   .form-control{
    -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, .1);
    -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, .1);
    box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, .1);
  }
  .btn-primary.btn-orange{
    background-color: #ff6e12;
    background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, #ffbb30), color-stop(100%, #ff6e12));
    background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #ffbb30 0%, #ff6e12 100%);
    background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #ffbb30 0%, #ff6e12 100%);
    background-image: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #ffbb30 0%, #ff6e12 100%);
    background-image: -o-linear-gradient(top, #ffbb30 0%, #ff6e12 100%);
    background-image: linear-gradient(top, #ffbb30 0%, #ff6e12 100%);
    border-color: #aa6011;
    text-shadow: 0 -1px 0 #aa6011;
  }
  .fancybox-wrap .fancybox-skin{
    padding: 0 !important;
  }
  #ssp-overlay{
    border-radius: 5px;
    overflow: hidden;
    width: 550px;
    padding: 0 40px 20px;
    background: url('/static/img/light-green-bg.jpg');
  }
  #ssp-overlay .ssp-header{
    margin: 0 -40px 30px;
    padding: 20px 40px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #fff;
    background-color: #cee7f2;
    background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%, #e6f3f8), color-stop(100%, #cee7f2));
    background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #e6f3f8 0%, #cee7f2 100%);
    background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #e6f3f8 0%, #cee7f2 100%);
    background-image: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #e6f3f8 0%, #cee7f2 100%);
    background-image: -o-linear-gradient(top, #e6f3f8 0%, #cee7f2 100%);
    background-image: linear-gradient(top, #e6f3f8 0%, #cee7f2 100%);
  }
  .vertical-align {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .ssp-header ul{
    list-style: inside;
    margin-top: 10px;
    font-size: 15px;
  }

  .business-owner-radio .formError{
    margin-left: 333px;
  }
  </style>

        Yes, Send Me a Free Report
       </button>
       <br/>
       <br/>
       <a href="#" id="btnBBClose">
        No Thanks, I prefer to spend hours planning routes and want my team to keep driving in circles.
       </a>
      </div>

     <!--      </fieldset>-->
    </form>
    <div id="bounceBackOk" style="display: none; padding-bottom: 20px;">
     Thank You! We will send your exciting report on how to minimize route planning time.
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   if(!getCookie('exitOverlayFormSubmitted')){
    Bounceback.init({
      onBounce: function(){

        $.fancybox({
          'autoScale': true,
          'transitionIn': 'elastic',
          'transitionOut': 'elastic',
          'speedIn': 500,
          'speedOut': 300,
          'autoDimensions': false,
          'centerOnScroll': true,
          'href': '#ssp-overlay',
          'closeBtn': false
        });

        $("#bounceBackForm").validationEngine({promptPosition: "topRight2:2", scroll: false});

        $('#btnBBClose').click(function(e){
          e.preventDefault();
          $.fancybox.close();
        });

        var emailField = $('#emailInput');
        emailField.keyup(function() {
          if(emailField.val()===''){
            emailField.removeClass('validate[custom[email]]');
            emailField.addClass('validate[required]');
          }else{
            emailField.removeClass('validate[required]');
            emailField.addClass('validate[custom[email]]');
          }
        });

        $('#btnBBSubmit').click(function(e){
          e.preventDefault();
          if($("#bounceBackForm").validationEngine('validate')){
            $("#bounceBackForm").submit();
          }
        });

        $("#bounceBackForm").submit(function(e){
          var postData = $(this).serializeArray();
          var formURL = $(this).attr("action");
          $.ajax(
            {
              url: formURL,
              type: "POST",
              data: postData,
              beforeSend: function(){
                $("#btnBBSubmit").prop('disabled', true);
              },
              success: function(data, textStatus, jqXHR){
                if($.parseJSON(data).status == true){
                  $("#bounceBackForm").hide();
                  $("#bounceBackOk").show();
                  setCookie('exitOverlayFormSubmitted', true);
                }else{
                  if($.parseJSON(data).errorCode == 1){
                    $("#btnBBSubmit").prop('disabled', false);
                    $('#emailInput').validationEngine('showPrompt', '* invalid email address', 'error', "topRight2:2", true).focus();
                  }else{
                    $("#bounceBackForm").html('ERROR');
                  }
                }
              },
              error: function(jqXHR, textStatus, errorThrown){
                //console.log('error');
              }
            });
          e.preventDefault(); //STOP default action
        });
      }, aggressive: true //should be shown on every page view
      //,maxDisplay: 100 //The maximum number of times the dialog may be shown on a page
    });

  }

  function setCookie(name,value,days) {
    if (days) {
      var date = new Date();
      date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000));
      var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString();
    }
    else var expires = "";
    document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/";
  }

  function getCookie(name) {
    var nameEQ = name + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
      if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
    }
    return null;
  }
  </script>

   <h1 class="center" style="font-size: 50px; margin-bottom: 20px;">
    Never Spend More Than 60 Seconds Per Day
    <br/>
    Planning Routes With Route4Me
   </h1>
   <p>
    Do you think FedEx or UPS could service millions of customers each year if they were still using pen and paper, a whiteboard, or Google Maps? Visiting more customers with Route4Me is easy
      if you want to save time on planning routes. On average, Route4Me users reduce their daily route planning chore to less than 10 minutes per day,
      but drivers may experience a staggering 35% reduction in drive time. The time and money savings are even bigger for fleets looking for a fleet routing software solution.

   <div class="container niceQuote">
    <img alt="Route4Me is the driving route planner for Signature Home Buyers" src="/static/img/home/quotes/shb.png"/>
    <p>
     <img alt="Route planning used to be difficult for Signature Home Buyers" src="/static/img/home/quotes/shb-faces.jpg"/>
     When Ms. Schuttig, Marketing Director of Signature Home Buyers, a local investment company that buys, sells and renovates properties in the upstate New York area, expanded the coverage to 2-3 new persons posting 80 - 100
        signs every weekend over a 40 mile radius, she used a map to train them. "I had to hand-hold them the entire time", she said, "and, if they were not familiar with the area, they zig-zagged all over the place."
    </p>

       </li>

  <div class="quoteBox">
   <div class="container niceQuote">
    <img alt="The best routing app, according to Yahoo, is Route4Me" src="/static/img/home/quotes/yahoo.png"/>
    <p>
     "Just put in the addresses, and let it work its magic."
    </p>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div class="container block">
   <div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-4 col-md-push-8 col-sm-12 center">
     <img alt="Route scheduling software for regular and easy planning" src="/static/img/home/schedule.png"/>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-8 col-md-pull-4 col-sm-12">
     <h1 style="font-size: 40px; margin-bottom: 5px;">
      Route Scheduling &amp; Route Planning Software That Adapts to Your Business Schedule
     </h1>
     <h2 style="margin-bottom: 20px;">
      Our Software Supports Routes That Change Daily, Weekly, or Seasonally
     </h2>
     <p>
      Weekly pool cleanings, schedule sales visits, or delivery routes that change daily are no longer a problem.
          Because no matter how often your business requires you to visit customers, our service routing software lets you plan routes
          that fit any schedule, shape, or size. And it's not just limited to dynamic delivery route planning or service route planning, but you can use it for sales route planning.
     </p>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="row" style="margin-top: 70px;">
    <img alt="Quickly schedule optimized routes days, weeks, months, or years in advance with ease." src="static/img/home/scheduling.jpg" style="max-width: 100%;"/>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div class="quoteBox">
   <div class="container niceQuote">
    <img alt="USA Today says that the best routing app is Route4Me" src="/static/img/home/quotes/usa-today.png"/>
    <p>
     The app could be particularly helpful for
        Small business owners who regularly make multiple deliveries in a single trip.
    </p>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div class="container block">
   <div class="row">
    <div class="col-sm-4 center">
     <img alt="No expensive hardware is needed with web-based Route optimization software" src="/static/img/home/no-hardware.png" style="margin-top: 45px;"/>
    </div>
    <div class="col-sm-8">
     <h1 style="font-size: 55px;">
      No Expensive Hardware
      <br/>
      to Purchase or Install
     </h1>
     <h2 style="margin-bottom: 20px;">
      Just Your Regular Computer or a Smartphone
     </h2>
     <p>
      Why keep throwing money at obsolete software from the legacy software companies (you know who they are!) when you can spend as little as $249/month for a Team plan with no software to install or upgrade? Forget
          about compatibility issues or mandatory yearly updates. Route4Me works on the iPhone, iPad, Android, Google Chrome, Internet Explorer, Firefox, and Safari. Software updates happen many times per day at no additional cost to you.
     </p>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div class="quoteBox">
   <div class="container niceQuote">
    <img alt="Route4Me is the best routing app, says American Newspaper Solutions" src="/static/img/home/quotes/ans.png"/>
    <p>
     Amber Saujon, Marketing Operations Manager for American Newspaper Solutions, Wichita, Kansas: "A client thought they had 100% saturation, but I knew they didn't. I brought up the app, to show the area to my client, which proved my point." Client relations, immediately optimized routes, visual confirmation of new routes, and no printing or paper wasted—all make this Market Operations Manager happy with Route4Me.
    </p>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div class="container block">
   <h1 style="font-size: 45px;">
    The Best Routes Created For You Everytime
   </h1>
   <p>
    Our service is designed to reduce the amount of time it takes you to plan routes. In addition to servicing more customers with our service routing software, you and/or your drivers will also save gas, time driving, and decrease your environmental footprint. And, since Route4Me
          costs less per driver, as you add more team-members, fleet route planning savings really add up.
   </p>
   <div class="row" style="margin-top: 50px;">
    <div class="col-md-4 col-sm-12" style="padding-left: 80px; min-height: 120px; background: url('/static/img/home/benefits1.png') no-repeat 10px 20px;">
     <h3 style="font-size: 22px;">
      Save Time &amp; Gas
     </h3>
     <p>
      Every route is up to 35% shorter on average. That's over $1,000.00 in savings if you spend more than $3,000 a year on gas.
     </p>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-4 col-sm-12" style="padding-left: 80px; min-height: 120px; background: url('/static/img/home/benefits2.png') no-repeat 0 15px;">
     <h3 style="font-size: 22px;">
      Know Where Your Drivers and Vehicles Are in Real-Time
     </h3>
     <p>
      Stay in control by letting you track the location of all your drivers.
     </p>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-4 col-sm-12" style="padding-left: 80px; min-height: 120px; background: url('/static/img/home/benefits3.png') no-repeat 8px 20px;">
     <h3 style="font-size: 22px;">
      Saves Hours Daily
     </h3>
     <p>
      Efficiency starts with saving your own time, but extends to saving the time of your drivers and customers.
     </p>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
  <hr/>
  <div class="container block">
   <h1 class="center" style="font-size: 45px; line-height: 50px; margin-bottom: 5px;">
    Stop Worrying About Servicing
    <br/>
    All Those New Customers
   </h1>
   <h2 class="center" style="margin-bottom: 12px;">
    Our Software Does All the Hard Work By Planning Routes For You
   </h2>
   <div class="center" style="padding: 50px 0;">
    <img alt="Route scheduling software that easily supports more customers" src="/static/img/home/success-3.png" style="max-width: 100%;"/>
   </div>
   <p>
    Want to impress your investors, partners, or boss? Then boost your customer count - the one true marker
      of business growth and success. As you add more customers,
      the time and cost complexity of servicing all of them goes up exponentially.
      Planning employee schedules, routes, and tracking field personnel are the biggest
      hurdles to growth for any field-service, field-sales, or delivery business. Route4Me's service routing software will help you exceed all of your business needs by improving customer satisfaction, lowering your operational costs, and by reducing the time it takes to plan routes to less than 10 minutes per day.
   </p>
  </div>
  <hr/>
  <div class="container block">
   <h1 class="center" style="font-size: 43px; line-height: 50px; margin-bottom: 25px;">
    Route4Me's Platform Works For Businesses Of All Sizes
   </h1>
   <div class="liquid-pic center hidden-xs" style="margin: 40px 0 90px; font-size: 18px;">
    <img alt="Dynamic routing for all kinds of route types" src="/static/img/home/route-types.png" style="margin-top: 20px;"/>

     <div style="left: 9%;">

  <hr/>
  <div class="container block">
   <h1 class="center" style="font-size: 33px;">
    Plan Optimized Routes &amp; Schedules in Only 3 Steps
   </h1>
   <p>
    Just type, copy-and-paste, or upload your list of customers or addresses that you need to visit. Hit plan route, see the optimized route on your computer, get it on your mobile device right away, and travel it.
   </p>
   <div class="liquid-pic xhidden-xs" style="margin: 40px 0 120px; font-size: 18px;">
    <img alt="Run route planner by uploading addresses, planning routes, and optimizing routes" src="/static/img/home/workflow1.png" style="margin-top: 20px;"/>
    <div class="labels">
     <div class="left" style="left: 1%;">
      <div>
       Type or Upload Addresses
       <p style="font-size: .8em;">
        (Orders, Pickups, Deliveries)
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div style="left: 34%;">
      <div>
       Plan Route
      </div>
     </div>
     <div style="left: 64%;">
      <div>
       Optimized Route
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="right" style="left: 95%;">
      <div>
       Travel
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <h2 class="center">
    Team Route Optimization &amp; Fleet Route Optimization
   </h2>
   <p>
    Upload large files having hundreds or thousands of orders, one or many depots, with support for dozens of regions, hundreds or thousands of drivers. Optimized routes are created and distributed to field personnel,
      and they can be tracked in real-time. From a single dashboard, you can track the team, move customers from one route to another, monitor your entire fleet, and much more.
   </p>
   <div class="liquid-pic hidden-xs" style="margin: 40px 0 90px; font-size: 18px;">
    <img alt="Route4Me is a driving route planner to improve your business workflow" src="/static/img/home/workflow2.png" style="margin-top: 20px;"/>
    <div class="labels">
     <div class="left" style="left: 2%;">
      <div>
       Upload Depots,
       <br/>
       Addresses &amp; Drivers
       <p style="font-size: .8em;">
        (Orders, Pickups, Deliveries)
       </p>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div style="left: 30%;">
      <div>
       Plan Routes
      </div>
     </div>
     <div style="left: 52%;">
      <div>
       Optimized Routes
      </div>
     </div>
     <div style="left: 75%;">
      <div>
       Track Team
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="right" style="left: 95%;">
      <div>
       Add Orders
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
  <hr/>
  <div class="container block">
   <div class="row">
    <div class="col-sm-7">
     <h1 style="font-size: 50px; margin-bottom: 35px;">
      Syncs with your iPhone,
      <br/>
      iPad, and Android
     </h1>
     <p>
      Our mobile route planning apps feature real-time synchronization of all of your
          routes and customer addresses, written notes &amp; photos at each stop, sign-on-glass
          verification, route progress &amp; location tracking, and more.
     </p>
     <p>
      Route4Me is the only route planning software that has native applications built for the
          iPhone &amp; iPad and the Google Android platform.
     </p>
     <p>
      And, with over 1,000,000 downloads and tens of billions of miles planned since 2009, you can rest
          assured that our Mobile Apps been continuously tested and improved over the years.
     </p>
     <p>
      The Route4Me app offers turn-by-turn directions and works automatically with Google Maps, Waze, and
            over 500 telematics vendors.
     </p>
    </div>
    <div class="col-sm-5 center">
     <img alt="Route4Me is the best routing app for all devices" src="/static/img/home/integration.jpg" style="margin-top: 35px;"/>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div class="container block">
   <div class="row">
    <div class="col-sm-4 center">
     <img alt="Global dynamic routing is possible for Route4Me" src="/static/img/home/global.png" style="margin-top: 15px;"/>
    </div>
    <div class="col-sm-8">
     <h1 style="padding-top: 20px;">
      Maps &amp; Routes
      <br/>
      For Your Country
     </h1>
     <p style="margin-bottom: 20px;">
      Our fleet route planning software has mapping data for every country in the world, so when you start
          planning optimized routes for your business, it will work in your country.
     </p>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
  <hr/>
  <div class="container block">
   <div>
    <img alt="Route4Me's map route planner allows you to map, search, and categorize customers" src="/static/img/home/features1.jpg" style="float:left; padding-right: 30px; max-width: 100%;"/>
    <h1 style="margin-bottom: 20px;">
     Map &amp; Visit Your Customers
    </h1>
    <p>
     Map, search, and categorize your customers &amp; prospects using Route4Me.  If you're a new business, you can enter customer information every time you close a new account. And, if
        you're already established - you can upload thousands of customers at one time. As business continues to grow, you can setup sales and delivery territories.
    </p>
    <p>
     Once addresses are loaded, just select the ones you want to visit, or easily plan a
        new route by drawing a region around customers that need to be visited. You can even specify the exact time at which a customer should be visited.
    </p>
   </div>
   <div class="clear" style="margin-bottom: 120px;">
    <!-- -->
   </div>
   <div>
    <img alt="All optimized routes can be seen in one go with Route4Me" src="/static/img/home/features2.jpg" style="float:right; padding-left: 30px; max-width: 100%;"/>
    <h1 style="margin-bottom: 20px;">
     See All Your Optimized Routes
    </h1>
    <p>
     If you have multiple routes and drivers, Route4Me provides an overview of your entire operation. Re-assign drivers and vehicles, move an address
        from one route to another, and track route progress in real-time.
    </p>
    <p>
     In addition to our fleet routing optimization capabilities, your Route4Me account is connected to our Mobile Apps, so that
        drivers and customers immediately get notified of changes you make, and
        you see every address, order, note, picture, video, and modification they make inside your account.
    </p>
   </div>
   <div class="clear" style="margin-bottom: 120px;">
    <!-- -->
   </div>
   <div>
    <img alt="Get route information immediately and in real time through Route4Me" src="/static/img/home/features3.jpg" style="float:left; padding-right: 30px;color:#444; max-width: 100%;"/>
    <h1 style="margin-bottom: 20px;">
     Instantly See Helpful Info About Your Operation
    </h1>
    <p>
     You'll see your business in a clearer way because we'll show you detailed mileages, route manifests, and fuel cost dollars saved. In addition to detailed driving costs, each address on a route can capture extended
        information such as revenue, cost, and service-time.
    </p>
    <p>
     You don't need to be good with math or fancy accounting software. Everything related to your operation is automatically calculated and can be used to make common business decisions.
        In a few clicks you can see really helpful info about a specific route, driver, or region.
    </p>
   </div>
   <div class="clear" style="margin-bottom: 120px;">
    <!-- -->
   </div>
   <div>
    <img alt="Route4Me is the best routing app to track route progress and others" src="/static/img/home/features4.png" style="float:right; padding-left: 30px;color:#444; max-width: 100%;"/>
    <h1 style="margin-bottom: 20px;">
     Track Route Progress, Take Pictures, Add Videos, Notes, and More
    </h1>
    <p>
     Route4Me is the only route optimization software on the planet which has iPhone, iPad, and Android applications which permit you to attach notes and media to any stop on your route.
    </p>
    <p>
     You and your drivers, users, customers, or employees can mark each location as visited, departed, have sign-on-glass eSignatures, and you can see all notes, media, and track all progress from everyone in your company
        instantly within your Route4Me account. Arrival and departure times in the route manifest update as soon as a check-in or check-out happens.
    </p>
   </div>
   <div class="clear">
    <!-- -->
   </div>
  </div>
  <style type="text/css">
   #footer{
    padding: 20px 0;
    background-color: #3f4d73;
  }
  #footer .title{
    color: #fff;
    font-size: 15px;
    font-weight: bold;
  }

  #footer .row{
    padding-bottom: 30px;
  }

  #footer ul{
    float: left;
    list-style: none;
    padding: 20px 25px 20px 0;
  }
  #footer a{
    font-size: 13px;
    color: #fff;
  }

  .footer-icon{ background:url("/static/img/sprites/hotlink-ok/footer-icon.png") top left no-repeat; }
  .footer-icon-4{ width:74px; height:54px; background-position:-2px -2px; }
  .footer-icon-3{ width:60px; height:54px; background-position:-2px -58px; }
  .footer-icon-2{ width:49px; height:54px; background-position:-2px -114px; }
  .footer-icon-1{ width:49px; height:54px; background-position:-2px -170px; }

  @media (max-width: 740px) {
    #footer .row .col-xs-6 ul{
      padding-right: 5px;
    }
  }
  @media (min-width: 645px) {
    #footer .row .col-xs-6 {
      width: auto;
      position: relative;
    }

  }
  @media (max-width: 644px) {
    #footer{
      padding-bottom: 50px;
    }
    #footer .row .col-xs-6 ul{
      width: 160px;
      /*margin: 0 auto;*/
      float: none;
    }
    #footer .cla{
      box-sizing: border-box;
      clear:both;
      display:table;
      height:0;
      width:0;
    }
  }
  </style>

        <a href="https://iot.route4me.com/" target="_iot" title="Connect your IoT stack">
         IoT Integrations
        </a>
       </li>

     </div>
